The inter-rater reliability , sensitivity specificity reader evaluate . The primary image set determination inter-reader agreement comprise image 119 subject two previous clinical study ( A07 [ NCT00857415 ] /A16 [ NCT01447719 ] A05 [ NCT00702143 ] ) . This include 59 subject come autopsy Study A07 ( NCT00857415 ) 's follow-up study , A16 ( NCT01447719 ) , set 60 case randomly select Study A05 ( NCT00702143 ) subject , include 20 cognitively-normal control , 20 mild cognitive impairment ) MCI , 20 AD . This increase number unique case validation dataset 151 scan 33 scan repeat yield total 184 scan review reader .
